Text: Fashion Police is uploaded every week... it's on Friday nights, and I always post it after it's aired... just search on TPB for "Fashion Police" and you'll find all the episodes :)
Thank you so much I have been looking for this for days. We all appreciate your hard work. I am sure it's not easy. Thanks again

I served with Russell Williams in the middle east.  He appeared to be a very nice man. I actually ate breakfast with him (in middle east) as he asked about my son (I was a 25yr old single mother) and how I was enjoying the tour.  Another MARRIED girl who served with us in the middle east lived beside Cpl Comeau.  This is a very interesting story for those not close to the case but for us, it still brings back so many emotions.  
The actor who played him did a very good job.  Captured his demeanor amazingly. Although the movie manipulated some of the facts, it's still pretty accurate.
V/A 9
I am from Belleville.... this movie sure hit home. I remember having a flyer looking for Jessica. Thanks for the upload!
russ looked sooooo soooo hawt in his lingerie
